tool.name: glob
tool.description:
Find files matching a glob pattern. Results are sorted by modification time (newest first).
Common patterns: - "*.py" - All Python files in the directory - "**/*.ts" - All TypeScript files recursively - "src/**/*.js" - All JS files under src/ - "test_*.py" - All files starting with test_
The tool automatically ignores common directories like node_modules, .git, __pycache__, etc. Results are limited to 200 files maximum.

parameters.parameter: The glob pattern to match files against. Supports standard glob syntax: *, **, ?, [...]
The directory to search in. If not specified, uses the project root. IMPORTANT: Omit this field to use the default. Do not use "undefined" or "null".

returns.field: The search directory relative to root
